entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
